data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Amajyepfo, Rwanda so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Amajyepfo, Rwanda
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Amajyepfo to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Amajyepfo. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 2,590,000 people living in Amajyepfo through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Eglise Catholique, Centrale GIKO
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Eglise Catholique, Centrale GIKO, Amajyepfo, Rwanda.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Amajyepfo.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Amajyepfo words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Amajyepfo.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

location.name: Amajyepfo
location.cities_list: Butare, Gitarama, Nzega, Eglise Catholique, Centrale GIKO, Nyanza
location.cities_list_w_pop: Butare (89,600), Gitarama (87,613), Nzega (33,832), Eglise Catholique, Centrale GIKO (3,000), Nyanza
